font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 恳求： to plead with especially in order to persuade, ask urgently
【例】 entreated his boss for another chance 恳求老板再给一次机会
【近】 beseech, besiege[bɪ'sidʒ], conjure, implore, importune, solicit, supplicate恳求，哀求；恳请, plead to, appeal to
【记】 treat 请客，it's my treat 我请客，实际上为了恳求你办事；treat 治疗，求您给治病吧
